creator: frut666@netscape.net
text:
I've compiled and installed the webserver with working ssl support. I use my own
self signed certificate. This works fine.

However, when initially going to the site you get the standard pop-up window
that tells you that the certificate is not signed by a trusted third party. When
I do not accept the certificate the server sends back no response whatsoever.
This happens for both IE and Netscpe 7.1.

I would expect a response from the http server, as well an entry in the
error_log, but I get none.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
The browser will terminate the connection to the server in that situation, so
there is no opportunity for an HTTP response.  (you can increase the LogLevel to
see the error_log messages)
